about_the_game:
Start your bartending adventure with a small bar that has already passed its heyday and transform it into a thriving place. Grow as a bartender, learn new drink recipes and create your own unique ones. Make a real show with your bartending flair and gain recognition and reputation in the eyes of your guests. Attract as many customers as possible to your premises so that you can earn and invest in your business.

Become a bartender with Bartender Simulator

Improve and expand your premises by arranging the interior and buying stylish chairs, tables, sofas, lighting, bar utensils, bartending accessories, decorations and more and more expensive alcohol. Start with a small coin-operated jukebox, then buy a professional sound system and hire a live music band on your stage! Create a place for VIP guests and attract well-off clients - it's all within your reach.



Bartender Simulator will not only let you make drinks for your guests, but also talk to them, tell jokes and anecdotes, entertain them with various bartending tricks that you will be able to develop through the skill tree. Buy the best bartending accessories, draw the attention of your customers and intrigue them. Observe the behavior of your guests, react when it is necessary and take care of your reputation and reputation of your bar.



Your interaction with customers is vital for the future of your bar and your reputation as a bartender. If you see a sad customer sitting at the bar, offer him a conversation or something stronger - make him feel good in your bar again. If you see a couple in love approaching the bar, offer them a free glass of champagne to start with to encourage them to stay in your place.



Listen to your guests' stories, cheer them up, give them advice or offer something special. Build relationships, and maybe someday you will get a huge tip and develop your place even faster. If it is going to take a lot of time to make the drink that your customer ordered, make it pleasant and shorten the waiting time with a conversation.



Thanks to the extensive skill tree in Bartender Simulator, you'll be able to learn many new bartending tricks: fiery drinks, bottle juggling, holding multiple bottles and glasses in your hands, custom drink mixing skills, and more.



Start with basic drinks such as Mojito, Pina Colada and Negroni. Learn them according to the recipes and train their preparation until the recipe preview is no longer needed. Serve the best quality drinks as soon as you can! Your cocktails and drinks will be assessed on several levels, taking into account preparation time, in accordance with the recipe and serving style. Make your own original drinks, serve them to your guests and watch their reaction. When you find the drink that your customers enjoy the most, add it to your drink menu and name it however you like.



Take care of the assortment in your premises, choose from many suppliers, negotiate prices with them and make sure that the ordered goods are fresh and of the best quality. You probably wouldn't want to serve a Mojito with stale ingredients, would you?

Bartender Simulator will let you choose from an extremely wide range of glasses, alcohol, soft drinks and additives. You will learn professional bartending knowledge, learn various bartending techniques and much more.

BTW, you will be able to try your drinks ... Just remember to enjoy responsibly :)

content_descriptors.notes: There is alcohol in the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 Ghz or AMD Phenom II 2.6 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB & AMD 7970 or nVidia 770 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device

Recommended:

  • Processor: Fourth Generation Intel Core i5 2.5 Ghz or AMD FX8350 4.0 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB & nVidia 960 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device

short_description: Become the bartender and bar owner with Bartender Simulator! Start with a small and little-known bar, expand your business and attract new guests. Serve well-known drinks and create new unique ones, develop your bartending and flair skills. Make you and your bar the best and most famous in the city!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
